episodes.desc:
It's very quiet...
The tunnel intersects with another. Do you go left, straight, or right?

left: You walk through the eerie center.
right: You walk through the eerie center.

episodes.desc: All of the sudden you hear water running, and to your left is an underground lake. Do you drink from it, or keep going?

go: You may have saved yourself. Onwards.

episodes.desc:
It's been a long day so far...
Do you want to take a break and rest?

stay: Exhausted, you decide to take a nap anyway.
go: You may have missed out on a much needed nap

episodes.desc: There's a treasure chest a little ways up. Do you want to open it up?

open:
You open the chest.
Nothing inside.
Suddenly, a monster attacks you.
ignore: Looks like you just can't ignore danger - a monster attacks you.

episodes.desc: There's a lone monster up ahead - What do you want to do?

fight: You yell at the top of your lungs and engage in combat
sneak: You get around it and find a couple of potions up ahead.
turn around: It sees you and attacks you.
No being a coward next time.
